name: Horizontal text collapser
plugin_instructions:
Expose ID's in your app's elements and in the workflow action "Collapse element width", specify the text's ID that you want to shrink its width. 
Run the workflow action "Collapse element width" and play with extra pixels to make it look the way you want it to.
